thread.title: Travel update: Delays on Southeastern | Meridian
thread.title_full: Travel update: Delays on Southeastern | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel update: Delays on Southeastern | Meridian
text:
Disruption on Southeastern between London Bridge and Charlton due to signalling problem between Deptford and Deptford.
Because of signalling problems in the London Bridge/Deptford area trains are currently unable to run via Greenwich in either direction. Engineers are on route to fix the problem. There is no estimate when a normal service is likely to resume
Last updated Tue 1 Sep 2015 Travel
